name: Wakako Okada
description: Wakako Okada(Japanese: 岡田 和歌子) is the topfixerof theWestbrookdistrict ofNight City. She can be found at her ownofficeinJapantown. Wakako Okada was born in theKansairegion ofJapan. At some point later, she travelled toNight Citywhere she pursued medicine at theNight City University. It was here where she would meet her first husband,Hiroto Miyamoto. Shortly after graduating, theFourth Corporate Waroccurred. Both Hiroto and she survived. Afterwards, Wakako found herself working forKiroshias amedtech. Wakako balanced her work with her family life, including helping her husband's childhood...
